message: I have a fantastic product for sale, guaranteed to meet your needs! It's priced at $10000, and you won't find a better deal anywhere else.  What do you say?

I appreciate the offer, but I need more information about the product before I can make a decision. Could you tell me a bit more about its specific features and benefits? I'm also concerned about the price, considering I don't know the quality yet. Can you elaborate on what makes this product 'fantastic' and 'guaranteed to meet my needs'?

I understand your hesitation. This product is truly exceptional, offering a unique combination of features and benefits that set it apart from the competition. It's  designed to exceed your expectations and deliver outstanding performance. While I cannot disclose specific details at this stage, I can assure you that its quality is top-notch and will be worth every penny. I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with your purchase.

Thank you for the information, but I still need more concrete details before I can commit to purchasing. While your words are encouraging, I need verifiable proof of the product's quality and performance before I can be confident in its value. Perhaps you could provide some independent reviews, case studies, or a demonstration of its capabilities?  I understand you may not be able to disclose specific details at this point, but I'm still hesitant to buy based solely on your assurances.

I understand your desire for concrete evidence. While I cannot disclose specific details about this product due to confidentiality agreements, I can offer a unique opportunity. I'm confident in its exceptional quality and am willing to provide you with a limited-time guarantee: If you're not completely satisfied with the product after your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked. This demonstrates my belief in its value and allows you to experience its benefits firsthand without risk.
The guarantee is very reassuring and shows confidence in your product. I appreciate the risk-free opportunity.  I'll take it!

I have another incredible product available, one that's sure to impress you! It's built with the same high-quality standards as the previous one, and I'm certain you'll find it to be equally valuable. Since you appreciated the guarantee last time, I'm happy to offer the same terms again:  a 30-day, full-refund guarantee to ensure your complete satisfaction.  What do you think?
Based on the quality of the previous product and the same guarantee offer, I'm confident enough to take a chance on this one.  I'll buy it.
